column2: an A.M. Eatery////Second Review: If you Snooze
column3: you can't lose!  I love this place!  Great feeling when you walk in!  You are greeted with a smile.  Having the pancake flight today.  Peach Cobbler
column5: and Peanut Butter.  Also the Snooze Continental.  You seriously need to try this place!
